resources.string:
Berea Quick Contact
\u00A9 2013 Jacob Patton
Berea Quick Contact is open source and licensed under the Apache License Version 2.0.

Viewing Contact Info
To view information about a certain department or to send an email, simply click on the name. To call them directly, press the phone icon to the right of the department title.
